title: Antihyperglycemic activity of a novel polyherbal formula (HF344), a mixture of fifteen herb extracts, for the management of type 2 diabetes: Evidence from in vitro, ex vivo, and in vivo studies
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Worawan Kitphati, Vilasinee Hirunpanich Sato, Penchom Peungvicha, Nakkawee Saengklub, Savita Chewchinda, Sumet Kongkiatpaiboon, Arman Syah Goli, Manaw Sangfuang, Jannarin Nontakham, Nutputsorn Chatsumpun, Supachoke Mangmool, Hitoshi Sato
